name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra
description: World-class noise cancellation with Immersive Audio. Features CustomTune sound calibration, 24-hour battery, and legendary Bose comfort for all-day wear.

reviews.review_text: ANC is still the best in the business. Bose knows audio.
Most comfortable headphones I have worn all day.
Immersive Audio is impressive but limited content.
